SEARCH

Class Container

java.lang.Object
Container
All Implemented Interfaces:
Common<Box<?>>, Comparable<Container>, Node<Container>, Stack<Box<?>>
class Container extends Object implements Stack<Box<?>>, Node<Container>, Comparable<Container>
The Container class implements a stack structure for storing boxes, a node for linked containers, and is comparable based on its priority. It can hold a variable number of Box objects and provides stack operations along with priority-based ordering.

    • size

      private int size
      The current number of boxes in the stack.

    • priority

      private double priority
      The priority value of the container, used for sorting. With each item added to container, container's priority increases with the item's priority

      private Container next
      The next container in a linked structure.
